uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.ssh

Class PublicKeyReaderUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.ssh.PublicKeyReaderUtil

  • public final class PublicKeyReaderUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is a utility class to read OpenSSH or SECSH encoded public key texts.
    Author:
    jSVNServe Team

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static java.security.PublicKey load(java.lang.String _key)
                                    throws PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException
        Decodes given public _key text and returns the related public key instance.
        Throws:
        PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException - if the public key could not be parsed from _key
        Parameters:
        _key - text key of the encoded public key
        Returns:
        decoded public key
        See Also:
        PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException.ErrorCode.UNKNOWN_PUBLIC_KEY_FILE_FORMAT, PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException.ErrorCode.UNKNOWN_PUBLIC_KEY_CERTIFICATE_FORMAT

      • extractOpenSSHBase64

        public static java.lang.String extractOpenSSHBase64(java.lang.String _key)
                                             throws PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException

        Extracts from the OpenSSH public key format the base64 encoded SSH public key.

        An example of such a definition is:
        ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAABIwAAAIEA1on8gxCGJJWSRT4uOrR130....

        Throws:
        PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException - if the OpenSSH public key string is corrupt
        Parameters:
        _key - text of the public key defined in the OpenSSH format
        Returns:
        base64 encoded public-key data
        See Also:
        PublicKeyReaderUtil.PublicKeyParseException.ErrorCode.CORRUPT_OPENSSH_PUBLIC_KEY_STRING, OpenSSH
